name: An Evening's Entertainment
description:
Your father wouldn't want me to tell you this. Why, he'd even prefer those musty old ghost fables, of sheeted spectres with saucer eyes, and Rawhead and Bloody Bones. 

But unlike those stories, this one is true, and I'll tell you all about it. 

Only you mustn't interrupt.

An adaptation of the M.R. James ghost story, "An Evening's Entertainment, for the Gaming Like It's 1925 jam; an interactive piece with multiple endings.

Original story: M.R. James, 1925, public domain.

Additional writing and design: 2021, Katherine Morayati.
